bio: I seek to spread knowledge about blockchain technology in the Arab world
contributionDescription:
In an effort to spread knowledge about blockchain technology and Web 3, I have made several videos and webinars about:
- Blockchain technology
- Web 3
- Smart contracts and decentralized applications
- Etheurem
- Optimism
- Base
- PGN
I tried to make the videos simple so that everyone can understand them
impactDescription: The users who watched the video series learned about the Optimism project, its features, and how it solves the problems faced by the Ethereum network, and now they has the knowledge that qualifies them to participate in the Optimism ecosystem, now they can begin their journey building on Optimism and participating in governance.
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Education, Content Creation, Community Building
